About us

Understanding
Financial Crimes

The majority of crime involves the movement of money. Crime, from petty theft to international terrorism, often leaves a financial footprint. Organised crime, political corruption, terrorist financing, and human trafficking rely heavily on the global financial system to launder money and fund their operations. To combat crime is to follow the money trail and disrupt the flow of illicit funds.

Who We Are: Innovating KYB Solutions for a Secure Future

At PlainSage, we specialize in Know Your Business (KYB) solutions designed to combat money laundering. Our advanced technology combines AI and cybersecurity to provide real-time risk assessments, ensuring businesses stay compliant and secure.

AI-Driven Risk Detection

Utilizing machine learning models to detect high-risk entities and behaviors with unmatched accuracy.

Real-Time Compliance Monitoring

Constant vigilance to meet global anti-money laundering standards and ensure business integrity.

The Problem We Solve

Businesses worldwide face immense challenges in ensuring compliance with evolving regulations while protecting themselves from financial crimes like money laundering. Traditional methods are often ineffective and time-consuming, exposing companies to substantial risk.

Inefficient Compliance Processes

Manual compliance efforts are slow, prone to errors, and unable to keep up with the fast-paced regulatory landscape.

Increased Fraud Risks

The lack of advanced AI-powered monitoring systems allows illicit activities to go unnoticed, increasing the risk of fraud.

Manual Risk Assessments

Companies often rely on outdated systems for risk assessments, leading to inefficient, time-consuming, and costly processes.

What Sets Us Apart

Our unique approach blends innovation, technology, and customer-focused solutions to create extraordinary results.

Cutting-Edge Technology

Our solutions use the latest technology to create systems that are efficient, reliable, and future-ready.

Unmatched Expertise

With decades of experience, our team ensures the highest quality outcomes, tailored to your needs.

Customer-Centric Approach

We prioritize customer satisfaction and offer customized solutions to meet unique challenges.
